property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you check a 1, 2, or 3, re-check (only one re-check per control check).R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent makes a control check, add the card used for the control check to their hand. Your opponent re-checks (only one re-check per control check). If the re-check is successful, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you check a 1, add the card used for the control check to your hand and re-check (only one re-check per control check).R Commit: After you make a control check that fails by 2 or less, that control check is successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you check a 1, add All control 1 cards in your discard pile to your hand.F: Commit any asset or foundation. You may commit 2 of your foundations to remove this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you pay the cost of an ability that requires you to discard momentum, you may discard any number of cards with a control of 1 from your hand. Each card discarded this way counts as 1 discarded momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready, after any player checks a 1, that player draws 1 card and then may discard 1 card from their card pool.Akuma/Ryu F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card. Either player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn, after your opponent checks a 6, they add the checked card to their hand and re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Choose a resource symbol. If your opponent attempts to block this attack, foundations with the chosen symbol may not be committed to modify your opponent's control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, reveal X cards from your hand with a control of 2 or less. Draw X cards.Akuma E: If this attack deals damage and you check a 1 for the control check to play your next card this turn, re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage and the control of the next attack you play this turn is 1, draw 2 cards after you play it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: If this attack deals damage and you checked a 1 to play this attack, if your next control check to play an attack fails by 3 or less, that control check is successful instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Discard 2 momentum as an additional cost to play this attack.E: If your opponent attempts to block this attack and if they check a 5 for the control check to play their block, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack (or any of its Multiple copies) deals damage, until the end of your opponent's next turn, after your opponent checks a 6, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, remove All the cards in your discard pile with a control of 2 or less from the game.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: R: After you check a 1, add the checked card to your hand and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you check a 2 or less, add the checked card to your hand.R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that adds 1 or more attacks to their card pool without a control check, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the beginning of your next turn, after any player fails a control check by 1, that check is successful instead.Akuma/Ryu R Commit: After you check a 1, discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your control check gets +1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose either 1, 2, or 3. For the rest of this turn, after a player checks the chosen number, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).Akuma/Ryu R Commit: After you check a 2 or less, that check gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Until the beginning of your next turn, after your opponent checks a 5 or higher, they re-check (only one re-check per control check). After your opponent plays an attack, this effect ends.Akuma/Ryu R Commit: After you check a 1, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a card into your card pool that matches 2 or more of your character's symbols, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations or assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After you fail a control check by 3 or less, that check is successful instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation, reveal a control 1 card in your hand: Each player draws 1 card. Each player may play this ability once per Enhance Step. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your Draw Step, draw 1 card. Than, you may add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's Draw Step, draw 1 card.E: This attack gets -X damage. X equals the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in your opponent's hand (minimum zero).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Reveal the top card of your deck: You may play the revealed card as though it were in your hand until the end of this turn.R Commit 1 foundation: Before you block with this card, change this card's block zone to high or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: If this attack deals no damage, draw X cards.R: After your opponent plays an ability that destroys a card in your staging area, if you have fewer cards in your staging area than they do, destroy 1 card in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X cards: This attack has its damage reduced by X+1. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: If you have at least 10 cards in your hand or 10 momentum, place 10 Balance tokens on this card. Only playable if there are 0 Balance tokens on this card.E Remove X Balance tokens from this card: Reduce this attack's damage by X (minimum 1). Either draw X cards or add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum (your choice). X may not be greater than half of this attack's printed damage (rounded down). Only playable during your opponent's attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before your Draw Step, if this card is in your hand you may add it to your card pool. You may not draw any cards this turn and you must discard down to your character's hand size. You may only play one copy of this attack in this way per turn. After your Ready Phase, play this attack as your first form (no control check necessary)

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, before your End Phase begins, add it to your staging area with X Balance tokens on it. X equals the number of cards in your hand.E Remove X Balance tokens from this card: If this attack deals damage, the next attack this turn gets -X damage. If this card has 0 Balance tokens on it, destroy this card. Only playable from your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may place this card in your card pool to completely block any ranged attack (no control check necessary).E: If this attack deals damage, during the next Ready Phase, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Draw 2 cards.E: If this attack deals damage, destroy any one asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's next attack this turn gets -3 damage (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum from your card pool this turn, add it face up.While this card is face up in your momentum, draw 1 card after your Draw Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, before your End Phase begins add it to your staging area with 2 Balance tokens on it.F Remove X Balance tokens from this card: Draw X cards. If this card has 0 Balance tokens on it, remove it from the game. Only playable from your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is commited your character gets +1 hand size. During your Ready Phase you may choose to leave this card committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you draw a card, discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Any attack gets -3 damage. If this reduces the damage of the attack to less than 1, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your opponent's next form this turn is an attack, it gets -4 damage. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you draw 1 or more cards, if you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, draw 1 card.R Commit: After you gain 1 or more momentum, if you have more momentum than your opponent, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Draw 1 card. If you have more momentum than your opponent, this attack gets -3 damage.R Commit: After your opponent's Ready Phase, until the beginning of your opponent's next turn, players may not add cards to their momentum during their Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: During your End Phase, add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum for each attack that dealt damage this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Any attack gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you have more cards in your hand and more momentum than your opponent, reduce All damage you take by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
